participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

mypi_alc.Description: Have you heard of drinks that contain alcohol, such as beer, wine or liquor, like rum, vodka, gin, whiskey, or tequila? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_full_drink.Description: Have you had a full drink containing alcohol at any time in the past 6 months, so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_sip.Description: Have you had a sip of a drink containing alcohol at any time in the past 6 months, so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_ceremony_drink.Description: Some people have alcohol as part of a religious ceremony such as in church or at a Seder dinner. Have you had a drink of alcohol that was NOT part of a religious service? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_sip_1b.Description: Some people have alcohol as part of a religious ceremony such as in church or at a Seder dinner. Have you had a sip of alcohol that was NOT part of a religious service? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_drink_used.Description: Did you have a full drink containing alcohol 5 or more times in the past 6 months, so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_sip_use.Description: Did you have a sip of a drink containing alcohol 5 or more times in the past 6 months,  so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_sip_pst_mo.Description: Did you have a sip of a drink containing alcohol in the past month? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_drink_lst_wk.Description: Did you have a full drink containing alcohol in the last week? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_alc_sip_lst_wk.Description: Did you have a sip of a drink containing alcohol in the last week? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_tob.Description: Have you heard of tobacco products, such as cigarettes, cigars, pipes, hookah, electronic or e-cigarettes? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_tob_used.Description: Have you smoked a full tobacco cigarette, cigar, or pipe, or had multiple puffs of hookah or an electronic cigarette at any time in the past 6 months, so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_tob_ceremony.Description: Some people smoke as part of a religious ceremony. Have you ever smoked a full tobacco cigarette, cigar, or pipe, or had multiple puffs of hookah or an electronic cigarette that was NOT part of a religious ceremony? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer

mypi_tob_pst_6mo.Description: Did you smoke a full tobacco cigarette, cigar, or pipe, or have multiple puffs of hookah or an electronic cigarette 5 or more times in the past 6 months, so from last (name of month 6 months ago) until today? | 1 = yes ; 0 = no ; 777 = refuse to answer
